compiler.automaton

Class SceneMakerAutomaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • compiler.automaton.Node
      • compiler.automaton.Supernode
        • compiler.automaton.SceneMakerAutomaton

  • public class SceneMakerAutomaton
extends Supernode
    A complete Scenemaker automaton. This class represents the "default" super node in Scenemaker.
    Author:
    Max Depenbrock
